line.comment: * $supplier = [NULL]-> call script 'Mayhem.Trade.FindSupplierV2': ware=$ware trader=$trader supplierRace=$supplierRace sector=$sector amountToImport=$amountToImport
* Heavy on performance due to FindStation:
* AI sees everything. Player cheats a bit also, for performance reasons.
* Trading stations and Pirate bases can always buy and sell.

sval.val: $supplier = [NULL]-> call script 'Mayhem.Trade.FindSupplierV2': ware=$ware trader=$trader supplierRace=$supplierRace sector=$sector amountToImport=$amountToImport
Heavy on performance due to FindStation:
AI sees everything. Player cheats a bit also, for performance reasons.
Trading stations and Pirate bases can always buy and sell.
